title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-7.4 - Federal financial participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-7.4 - Federal financial participation

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart shall be effective if, and as long as, Federal financial participation is available for medical assistance expenditures made pursuant to this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-7.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
